name: Delete Volume Shadow Copies Via WMI With PowerShell
description: Shadow Copies deletion using operating systems utilities via PowerShell
false_positives: Legitimate Administrator deletes Shadow Copies using operating systems utilities for legitimate reason
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*Get\-WmiObject* AND process.command_line:*\ Win32_Shadowcopy* AND process.command_line:(*Delete\(\)* OR *Remove\-WmiObject*))`
